thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South San Francisco, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Up scaled Hotel
thread.title_full: Up scaled Hotel - Review of Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Haveawonderfulday1
title: Up scaled Hotel
text: This is a nice, clean hotel with professional staff and service. The rooms are contemporary and appear new. The breakfast buffet is costly as I paid 14.98 for breakfast. The staff are friendly and asked if they can assist you. The front desk provides 2 bottles of water upon your arrival in which I like due to not wanting to drink the hotel water. I enjoy staying at Hilton Garden Inns as I feel relaxed while setting in the lobby area enjoying free lemonade and cookies at the end of a log business day.
